00042 KosmosBroker::KosmosBroker(PropertiesPtr &propsPtr) : mVerbose(false) {
00043 
00044   const char *metaName;
00045   int metaPort;
00046 
00047   mVerbose = propsPtr->get_bool("Hypertable.Verbose", false);
00048 
00049   KfsClient *clnt = KfsClient::Instance();
00050   metaName = propsPtr->get("Kfs.MetaServer.Name", "");
00051   metaPort = propsPtr->get_int("Kfs.MetaServer.Port", -1);
00052 
00053   std::cerr << "Server: " << metaName << " " << metaPort << std::endl;
00054   clnt->Init(metaName, metaPort);
00055   mRootdir = "";
00056 }

00067 void KosmosBroker::open(ResponseCallbackOpen *cb, const char *fileName, uint32_t bufferSize) {
00068   int fd;
00069   String absFileName;
00070   KfsClient *clnt = KfsClient::Instance();
00071 
00072   if (mVerbose) {
00073     HT_INFOF("open file='%s' bufferSize=%d", fileName, bufferSize);
00074   }
00075 
00076   if (fileName[0] == '/')
00077     absFileName = fileName;
00078   else
00079     absFileName = mRootdir + "/" + fileName;
00080 
00081   std::cerr << "Open file: " << absFileName << std::endl;  
00082 
00083   //fd = atomic_inc_return(&msUniqueId);
00084 
00088   if ((fd = clnt->Open(absFileName.c_str(), O_RDONLY)) < 0) {
00089     string errMsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(fd);
00090     HT_ERRORF("open failed: file='%s' - %s", absFileName.c_str(), errMsg.c_str());
00091     ReportError(cb, fd);
00092     return;
00093   }
00094 
00095   {
00096     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00097     OpenFileDataKosmosPtr dataPtr(new OpenFileDataKosmos(fd, O_RDONLY));
00098 
00099     cb->get_address(addr);
00100 
00101     std::cerr << "Got fd for file: " << absFileName << std::endl;
00102 
00103     m_open_file_map.create(fd, addr, dataPtr);
00104     
00105     std::cerr << "Inserted fd into open file map for file: "<< absFileName << std::endl;
00106 
00107     cb->response(fd);
00108   }
00109 }

00115 void KosmosBroker::create(ResponseCallbackOpen *cb, const char *fileName, bool overwrite,
00116             uint32_t bufferSize, uint16_t replication, uint64_t blockSize) {
00117   int fd;
00118   int flags;
00119   String absFileName;
00120   KfsClient *clnt = KfsClient::Instance();
00121   
00122   if (mVerbose) {
00123     HT_INFOF("create file='%s' overwrite=%d bufferSize=%d replication=%d blockSize=%d",
00124                 fileName, (int)overwrite, bufferSize, replication, blockSize);
00125   }
00126 
00127   if (fileName[0] == '/')
00128     absFileName = fileName;
00129   else
00130     absFileName = mRootdir + "/" + fileName;
00131 
00132 
00133   //fd = atomic_inc_return(&msUniqueId);
00134 
00135   if (overwrite)
00136     flags = O_WRONLY | O_CREAT | O_TRUNC;
00137   else
00138     flags = O_WRONLY | O_CREAT | O_APPEND;
00139 
00140   std::cerr << "Create file: " << absFileName << " " << flags << std::endl;  
00141 
00145   if ((fd = clnt->Open(absFileName.c_str(), flags)) < 0) {
00146     string errMsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(fd);
00147     std::cerr << "Create failed: " << errMsg << std::endl;
00148 
00149     HT_ERRORF("open failed: file='%s' - %s", absFileName.c_str(), errMsg.c_str());
00150     ReportError(cb, fd);
00151     return;
00152   }
00153 
00154   {
00155     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00156     OpenFileDataKosmosPtr dataPtr(new OpenFileDataKosmos(fd, O_WRONLY));
00157 
00158     cb->get_address(addr);
00159 
00160     m_open_file_map.create(fd, addr, dataPtr);
00161 
00162     cb->response(fd);
00163   }
00164 }

00170 void KosmosBroker::close(ResponseCallback *cb, uint32_t fd) {
00171   if (mVerbose) {
00172     HT_INFOF("close fd=%d", fd);
00173   }
00174 
00175   m_open_file_map.remove(fd);
00176 
00177   cb->response_ok();
00178 }

00184 void KosmosBroker::read(ResponseCallbackRead *cb, uint32_t fd, uint32_t amount) {
00185   OpenFileDataKosmosPtr dataPtr;
00186   ssize_t nread;
00187   uint64_t offset;
00188   KfsClient *clnt = KfsClient::Instance();
00189   StaticBuffer buf(new uint8_t [amount], amount);
00190 
00191   if (mVerbose) {
00192     HT_INFOF("read fd=%d amount=%d", fd, amount);
00193   }
00194 
00195   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, dataPtr)) {
00196     char errbuf[32];
00197     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00198     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00199     return;
00200   }
00201 
00202   offset = clnt->Tell(dataPtr->fd);
00203 
00204   if ((nread = clnt->Read(dataPtr->fd, (char *) buf.base, (size_t) amount)) < 0) {
00205     string errMsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(nread);
00206     HT_ERRORF("read failed: fd=%d amount=%d - %s", dataPtr->fd, amount, errMsg.c_str());
00207     ReportError(cb, nread);
00208     return;
00209   }
00210 
00211   buf.size = nread;
00212 
00213   cb->response(offset, buf);
00214 
00215 }

00221 void KosmosBroker::append(ResponseCallbackAppend *cb, uint32_t fd,
00222                           uint32_t amount, uint8_t *data, bool sync) {
00223   OpenFileDataKosmosPtr dataPtr;
00224   ssize_t nwritten;
00225   uint64_t offset;
00226   KfsClient *clnt = KfsClient::Instance();
00227   int res;
00228 
00229   if (mVerbose) {
00230     HT_INFOF("append fd=%d amount=%d", fd, amount);
00231   }
00232 
00233   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, dataPtr)) {
00234     char errbuf[32];
00235     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00236     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00237     return;
00238   }
00239 
00240   offset = clnt->Tell(dataPtr->fd);
00241 
00242   if ((nwritten = clnt->Write(dataPtr->fd, (const char *) data, (size_t) amount)) < 0) {
00243     string errMsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(nwritten);
00244     HT_ERRORF("write failed: fd=%d amount=%d - %s", dataPtr->fd, amount, errMsg.c_str());
00245     ReportError(cb, nwritten);
00246     return;
00247   }
00248 
00249   if (sync && (res = clnt->Sync(dataPtr->fd)) < 0) {
00250     string errMsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(res);
00251     HT_ERRORF("flush failed: fd=%d - %s", dataPtr->fd, errMsg.c_str());
00252     ReportError(cb, res);
00253     return;
00254   }
00255 
00256   cb->response(offset, nwritten);
00257   
00258   return;
00259 }

00265 void KosmosBroker::seek(ResponseCallback *cb, uint32_t fd, uint64_t offset) {
00266   OpenFileDataKosmosPtr dataPtr;
00267   KfsClient *clnt = KfsClient::Instance();
00268 
00269   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, dataPtr)) {
00270     char errbuf[32];
00271     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00272     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00273     return;
00274   }
00275 
00276   if ((offset = (uint64_t) clnt->Seek(dataPtr->fd, offset, SEEK_SET)) == (uint64_t) -1) {
00277     string errMsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(offset);
00278     HT_ERRORF("lseek failed: fd=%d offset=%lld - %s", dataPtr->fd, offset, errMsg.c_str());
00279     ReportError(cb, (int) offset);
00280     return;
00281   }
00282 
00283   cb->response_ok();
00284 }

00291   String absFileName;
00292   KfsClient *clnt = KfsClient::Instance();
00293   int res;
00294   
00295   if (mVerbose) {
00296     HT_INFOF("remove file='%s'", fileName);
00297   }
00298 
00299   if (fileName[0] == '/')
00300     absFileName = fileName;
00301   else
00302     absFileName = mRootdir + "/" + fileName;
00303 
00304   if ((res = clnt->Remove(absFileName.c_str())) < 0) {
00305     string errMsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(res);
00306     HT_ERRORF("unlink failed: file='%s' - %s", absFileName.c_str(), errMsg.c_str());
00307     ReportError(cb, res);
00308     return;
00309   }
00310 
00311   cb->response_ok();

00318 void KosmosBroker::length(ResponseCallbackLength *cb, const char *fileName) {
00319   String absFileName;
00320   uint64_t length;
00321   int res;
00322   KfsClient *clnt = KfsClient::Instance();
00323   struct stat statInfo;
00324   
00325   if (mVerbose) {
00326     HT_INFOF("length file='%s'", fileName);
00327   }
00328 
00329   if (fileName[0] == '/')
00330     absFileName = fileName;
00331   else
00332     absFileName = mRootdir + "/" + fileName;
00333 
00334   if ((res = clnt->Stat(absFileName.c_str(), statInfo)) < 0) {
00335     string errMsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(res);
00336     HT_ERRORF("length (stat) failed: file='%s' - %s", absFileName.c_str(), errMsg.c_str());
00337     ReportError(cb, res);
00338     return;
00339   }
00340   length = statInfo.st_size;
00341   cb->response(length);
00342 }

00348 void KosmosBroker::pread(ResponseCallbackRead *cb, uint32_t fd, uint64_t offset, uint32_t amount) {
00349   OpenFileDataKosmosPtr dataPtr;
00350   ssize_t nread;
00351   KfsClient *clnt = KfsClient::Instance();
00352   StaticBuffer buf(new uint8_t [amount], amount);
00353 
00354   if (mVerbose) {
00355     HT_INFOF("pread fd=%d offset=%lld amount=%d", fd, offset, amount);
00356   }
00357 
00358   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, dataPtr)) {
00359     char errbuf[32];
00360     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00361     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00362     return;
00363   }
00364 
00365   if ((offset = (uint64_t) clnt->Seek(dataPtr->fd, offset, SEEK_SET)) == (uint64_t) -1) {
00366     string errMsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(offset);
00367     HT_ERRORF("lseek failed: fd=%d offset=%lld - %s", dataPtr->fd, offset, errMsg.c_str());
00368     ReportError(cb, (int) offset);
00369     return;
00370   }
00371 
00372   if ((nread = clnt->Read(dataPtr->fd, (char *) buf.base, (size_t) amount)) < 0) {
00373     string errMsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(nread);
00374     HT_ERRORF("read failed: fd=%d amount=%d - %s", dataPtr->fd, amount, errMsg.c_str());
00375     ReportError(cb, nread);
00376     return;
00377   }
00378 
00379   buf.size = nread;
00380   
00381   cb->response(offset, buf);
00382 }

00388 void KosmosBroker::mkdirs(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *dirName) {
00389   String absDirName;
00390   String::size_type curr = 0;
00391   KfsClient *clnt = KfsClient::Instance();
00392   int res = 0;
00393   struct stat statBuf;
00394   
00395   if (mVerbose) {
00396     HT_INFOF("mkdirs dir='%s'", dirName);
00397   }
00398 
00399   if (dirName[0] == '/')
00400     absDirName = dirName;
00401   else
00402     absDirName = mRootdir + "/" + dirName;
00403 
00404   String path;
00405   while (curr != String::npos) {
00406     curr = absDirName.find('/', curr + 1);
00407     if (curr != String::npos) 
00408       path.assign(absDirName, 0, curr);
00409     else
00410       path = absDirName;
00411 
00412     std::cerr << "Stat'ing: " << path << std::endl;
00413 
00414     if (clnt->Stat(path.c_str(), statBuf) == 0) {
00415       if (!S_ISDIR(statBuf.st_mode)) {
00416         res = -ENOTDIR;
00417         break;
00418       }
00419       continue;
00420     }
00421     std::cerr << "Mkdir'ing: " << path << std::endl;
00422 
00423     res = clnt->Mkdir(path.c_str());
00424     if (res < 0)
00425       break;
00426   }
00427 
00428   if (res < 0) {
00429     string errMsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(res);
00430     HT_ERRORF("mkdirs failed: dirName='%s' - %s", absDirName.c_str(), errMsg.c_str());
00431     ReportError(cb, res);
00432     return;
00433   }
00434 
00435   cb->response_ok();
00436 }

00442 void KosmosBroker::rmdir(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *dirName) {
00443   String absDirName;
00444   KfsClient *clnt = KfsClient::Instance();
00445   int res;
00446   
00447   if (mVerbose) {
00448     HT_INFOF("rmdir dir='%s'", dirName);
00449   }
00450 
00451   if (dirName[0] == '/')
00452     absDirName = dirName;
00453   else
00454     absDirName = mRootdir + "/" + dirName;
00455 
00456   if ((res = clnt->Rmdirs(absDirName.c_str())) != 0) {
00457     string errMsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(res);
00458     HT_ERRORF("rmdir failed: dirName='%s' - %s", absDirName.c_str(), errMsg.c_str());
00459     ReportError(cb, res);
00460     return;
00461   }
00462 
00463   cb->response_ok();
00464 }

00470 void KosmosBroker::flush(ResponseCallback *cb, uint32_t fd) {
00471   OpenFileDataKosmosPtr dataPtr;
00472   KfsClient *clnt = KfsClient::Instance();
00473   int res;
00474 
00475   if (mVerbose) {
00476     HT_INFOF("flush fd=%d", fd);
00477   }
00478 
00479   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, dataPtr)) {
00480     char errbuf[32];
00481     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00482     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00483     return;
00484   }
00485 
00486   if ((res = clnt->Sync(dataPtr->fd)) < 0) {
00487     string errMsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(res);
00488     HT_ERRORF("flush failed: fd=%d - %s", dataPtr->fd, errMsg.c_str());
00489     ReportError(cb, res);
00490     return;
00491   }
00492 
00493   cb->response_ok();
00494 }

00508 void KosmosBroker::shutdown(ResponseCallback *cb) {
00509   m_open_file_map.remove_all();
00510   cb->response_ok();
00511   poll(0, 0, 2000);
00512 }

00515 void KosmosBroker::readdir(ResponseCallbackReaddir *cb, const char *dirName) {
00516   std::vector<String> listing;
00517   std::vector<String> stripped_listing;
00518   String abs_path;
00519   KfsClient *clnt = KfsClient::Instance();
00520   int error;
00521 
00522   if (mVerbose) {
00523     HT_INFOF("readdir dir_name='%s'", dirName);
00524   }
00525 
00526   if (dirName[0] == '/')
00527     abs_path = dirName;
00528   else
00529     abs_path = mRootdir + "/" + dirName;
00530 
00531   if ((error = clnt->Readdir(abs_path.c_str(), listing)) < 0) {
00532     string errMsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(error);
00533     HT_ERRORF("readdir failed: file='%s' - %s", abs_path.c_str(), errMsg.c_str());
00534     ReportError(cb, error);
00535     return;
00536   }
00537 
00538   for (size_t i=0;i<listing.size(); i++) {
00539          if (listing[i] == "." || listing[i] == "..")
00540            continue;
00541          stripped_listing.push_back(listing[i]);
00542        }
00543 
00544   HT_INFOF("Sending back %d listings", stripped_listing.size());
00545 
00546   cb->response(stripped_listing);
00547 }

00567 void
00568 KosmosBroker::rename(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *src, const char *dst) {
00569   KfsClient *client = KfsClient::Instance();
00570   int error;
00571 
00572   if (mVerbose)
00573     HT_INFOF("rename %s -> %s", src, dst);
00574 
00575   String absSrc =
00576     format("%s%s%s", mRootdir.c_str(), *src == '/' ? "" : "/", src);
00577   String absDst =
00578     format("%s%s%s", mRootdir.c_str(), *dst == '/' ? "" : "/", dst);
00579 
00580   if ((error = client->Rename(src, dst)) < 0)
00581     ReportError(cb, error);
00582   else
00583     cb->response_ok();
00584 }
00585 
00586 
00590 void KosmosBroker::ReportError(ResponseCallback *cb, int error) {
00591 
00592   string errbuf = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(error);
00593 
00594   if (error == ENOTDIR || error == ENAMETOOLONG || error == ENOENT)
00595     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILENAME, errbuf.c_str());
00596   else if (error == EACCES || error == EPERM)
00597     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_PERMISSION_DENIED, errbuf.c_str());
00598   else if (error == EBADF)
00599     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf.c_str());
00600   else if (error == EINVAL)
00601     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_INVALID_ARGUMENT, errbuf.c_str());
00602   else
00603     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_IO_ERROR, errbuf.c_str());
00604 }
